General.Name: Hiwin Mikrosystem Corp
General.Description: Hiwin Mikrosystem Corporation manufactures, repairs, and sells a various motors, drives, and automation systems in Taiwan and Israel. The company offers linear motor stages, controllers and drives, linear motors, direct drive motors, torque motors, spindle motors, AC servo motors, positioning measurement systems, and servo and linear actuators. It provides its products for use in optical component manufacturing, medicare and healthcare, semiconductor, rehabilitation, and automation equipment, as well as transportation applications. Hiwin Mikrosystem Corporation was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Taichung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Jingke Central Road, Taichung, Taiwan, 40852
